definition: to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Unity is a very convenient tool for multi-platform game development.
sentences.chinese: Unity是一款非常方便的跨平台游戏开发工具。

sentences.english: There, you have compatibility across the board.
sentences.chinese: 因为它拥有跨平台的兼容性。

sentences.english: Please select a code page for cross-platform data sharing.
sentences.chinese: 请选择代码页供跨平台数据共享。

sentences.english: This enables the same definition to work across platforms.
sentences.chinese: 这允许同一个定义跨平台工作。

sentences.english: Ah, the price for cross-platform compatibility.)
sentences.chinese: 这就是跨平台兼容性的代价。

sentences.english: That cross-platform compatibility really helped drive growth.
sentences.chinese: 跨平台的特性确实帮助了Tango快速增长。

sentences.english: Audacity - free, open source, cross platform digital audio editor.
sentences.chinese: 免费，开源，跨平台数字音频编辑器。

sentences.english: Before we get into the details, let's examine the term cross-platform application framework. What does that really mean?
sentences.chinese: 什么是跨平台应用框架呢？

sentences.english: We want to see something powerful and, oh, while you're at it...cross-platform too.
sentences.chinese: 我们想看到的是一款强大而且跨平台的应用。
更能完成跨平台的兼容。

sentences.english: Developers now have three ways to develop cross-platform.
sentences.chinese: 开发者有三个办法可以实现跨平台开发。

sentences.english: Google Duo is an attempt to fix this gap, letting users chat across platforms.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌垛是试图来弥补这一差距，跨平台让用户聊天。

sentences.english: Research and application of a cross-platform embedded GIS data model;
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一个跨平台远程并行程序调试器的设计与实现。

definition: to expand one's financial resources/abbr. for 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]
